message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, considering I don't lose value over time.
The value decreases quickly, Bob. Let's meet in the middle while there's still something worthwhile for me.
I'll take a bit more, since time is on my side and your share is losing value.
This is getting us nowhere, Bob. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
You're losing value fast, I'll take a bigger share. It's still a good deal for you considering the alternative.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit here. Accept this offer before we both lose out completely!
You're running out of time, and your share is worth less and less. I'll take a bigger share, it's still better than nothing for you.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it.  I'd rather get something than nothing at all.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll take an even bigger share. You can still walk away with something.
